questions:
What is the main focus of the photo?
A) A cat peeking through colorful tiles
B) A scenic landscape
C) A group of people
D) A piece of art

What situation does the photo depict?
A) A cat peeping through tiles
B) A family gathering
C) A sports event
D) A quiet street scene

What is in the center of the photo?
A) A cat's face
B) A tree
C) A person
D) A painting

What is in the background of the photo?
A) A city skyline
B) Colorful tiles
C) A mountain range
D) A body of water

What is in the foreground of the photo?
A) Colorful tiles
B) A cat's face
C) A flower
D) A book

A) Sleeping
B) Peeking through colorful tiles
C) Eating
D) Running

A) Wood
B) Plastic
C) Metal
D) Glass

A) Red, blue, green, yellow, purple
B) Black and white
C) Brown and beige
D) Pink and orange

A) Behind the tiles, peeping through

B) Circular
C) Triangular
D) Hexagonal

C) White
D) Orange

D) Hard and grainy

C) Overexposed
D) Underexposed

A) Wood
B) Carpet
C) Tile, plastic

B) Two

A) Green

C) Brown

A) A cat interacting with colorful tiles
